pages.title: Core: Tau Cannon
pages.text: The $(2)Tau Cannon Core$() is a $(6)charge-based$() core that projects a beam of tau particles. This sort of probabilistic manipulation requires an enormous amount of energy, and as such, low-charge bursts will tend to be fairly harmless.

pages.title: Tau Cannon Core
pages.text: The tau state condensation process becomes much more efficient as charge time increases, granting this core a much higher damage-to-energy ratio than more conventional weapons.
